alert.note: Alert for Jim Wells (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 29 at 3:26PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Jim Wells County through 400 PM CDT... At 326 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tecalote, or 11 miles northeast of San Diego, moving northeast at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Midway, Tecalote, Westdale and Rancho De La Parita. This includes US Highway 281 between mile markers 654 and 668. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
